S04n449:1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmatibodhisattvasahitaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrānucārī buddhānubhāvena utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhirabhyaṣṭāvīt -
S04n449:11: praśaṃsā yadi vā nindā tasyocyeta kathaṃ mune || 5 ||
S04n449:14: na nirvāsi nirvāṇena nirvāṇaṃ tvayi saṃsthitam |
S04n449:18: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya svanāmagotraṃ bhagavate saṃśrāvayati sma -
S04n449:21: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ |
S04n449:23: pṛcchantu māṃ jinasutāstvaṃ ca pṛccha mahāmate |
S04n449:25: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ paripṛcchati sma -
S04n449:26: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kasmāttarkaḥ pravartate |
S04n449:27: kathaṃ hi dṛśyate bhrāntiḥ kasmādbhrāntiḥ pravartate || 12 ||
S04n449:29: nirābhāsaḥ kramaḥ kena jinaputrāśca te kutaḥ || 13 ||
S04n449:30: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate |
S04n449:31: dhyāyināṃ viṣayaḥ ko'sau kathaṃ yānatrayaṃ bhavet || 14 ||
S04n449:32: pratyate jāyate kiṃ tatkāryaṃ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca kim |
S04n449:37: kathaṃ dṛśyaṃ vibhāvo kathaṃ kathaṃ bhūmiṣu vartate || 17 ||
S04n449:38: nirbhidyentribhavaṃ ko'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet |
S04n449:39: sthitaḥ pravartate kutra jinaputraḥ kathaṃ bhavet || 18 ||
S04n449:41: samādhyate kathaṃ cittaṃ brūhi me jinapuṃgava || 19 ||
S04n449:45: lakṣaṇasya vyavasthānaṃ nairātmyaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet || 21 ||
S04n449:46: kathaṃ na vidyate sattvaḥ saṃvṛtyā deśanā katham |
S04n449:48: kathaṃ hi tīrthikāstvaṃ ca lakṣaṇairna virudhyase |
S04n449:50: śūnyatā ca kathaṃ kena kṣaṇabhaṅgaśca te katham |
S04n449:51: kathaṃ pravartate garbhaḥ kathaṃ loko nirīhikaḥ || 24 ||
S04n449:57: kathaṃ ca budhyase lokaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe nirakṣaram || 27 ||
S04n449:61: nairātmyaṃ ca dvidhā kena kathaṃ jñeyaṃ viśudhyati || 29 ||
S04n449:62: jñānaṃ katividhaṃ nātha śīlaṃ sattvākarāṇi ca |
S04n449:67: kathaṃ yuktiḥ katividhā vyākhyānaṃ ca kathaṃvidham || 32 ||
S04n449:68: annapānaṃ ca vaicitryaṃ maithunaṃ jāyate katham |
S04n449:69: rājā ca cakravartī ca maṇḍalī ca kathaṃ bhavet || 33 ||
S04n449:72: vidyāsthānaṃ bhavetkiṃ ca mokṣo yogī katividhaḥ |
S04n449:77: prajñaptimātraṃ ca kathaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃvara || 37 ||
S04n449:78: ghanāḥ khe pavanaṃ kena smṛtirmegho kathaṃ bhavet |
S04n449:79: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena brūhi me tribhaveśvara || 38 ||
S04n449:80: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ yānti bāliśāḥ |
S04n449:81: uhoḍimā narāḥ kena brūhi me cittasārathe || 39 ||
S04n449:83: strīpuṃnapuṃsakānāṃ ca kathaṃ janma vadāhi me || 40 ||
S04n449:85: kathaṃ caivaṃvidhā yoge narāḥ sthāpyā vadāhi me || 41 ||
S04n449:86: gatyāgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ liṅgaṃ kiṃ ca lakṣaṇam |
S04n449:87: dhaneśvaro kathaṃ kena brūhi me gaganopama || 42 ||
S04n449:92: abhakṣyaṃ hi kathaṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ māṃsaṃ niṣidhyate |
S04n449:97: sarvaratnamayā kṣetrāḥ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me || 47 ||
S04n449:100: kena nirmāṇikā buddhāḥ kena buddhā vipākajāḥ |
S04n449:101: tathatā jñānabuddhā vai kathaṃ kena vadāhi me || 49 ||
S04n449:102: kāmadhātau kathaṃ kena na vibuddho vadāhi me |
S04n449:107: vinayo bhikṣubhāvaśca kathaṃ kena vadāhi me || 52 ||
S04n449:111: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta kathaṃ kena vadāhi me || 54 ||
S04n449:113: cikitsāśāstraṃ sattvānāṃ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me || 55 ||
S04n449:122: idaṃ śrutvā mahāvīro buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ |
S04n449:132: nirodhā ṛddhipādāśca bodhyaṅgā mārga eva ca |
S04n449:136: svabhāvaḥ kalpanā kalpyaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭidvayaṃ katham |
S04n449:139: jñānaṃ jñeyo gamaṃ prāptiḥ sattvānāṃ ca bhavābhavam || 68 ||
S04n449:140: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ brūhi me katham |
S04n449:142: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ kena nānābhrāntistathā nayam |
S04n449:143: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo'sti bhūmīnāṃ nāsti vai kramaḥ || 70 ||
S04n449:146: acalānāṃ tathā meroḥ pramāṇaṃ hi kṣiteḥ katham |
S04n449:149: kṣetre kṣetre rajāḥ kṛtto dhanvo dhanve bhavetkati || 73 ||
S04n449:151: śaśavātāyanaṃ likṣā eḍakaṃ hi yavāḥ kati || 74 ||
S04n449:152: prasthe hi syādyavāḥ kyantaḥ prasthārdhe ca yavāḥ kati |
S04n449:153: droṇe khāryāṃ tathā lakṣāḥ koṭyo vai biṃbarāḥ kati || 75 ||
S04n449:154: sarṣape hyaṇavaḥ kyanto rakṣikā sarṣapāḥ kati |
S04n449:156: karṣo hi dharaṇāḥ kyantaḥ palaṃ vai kati kārṣikā |
S04n449:158: evaṃ hi pṛccha māṃ putra anyathā kiṃ nu pṛcchasi || 77 ||
S04n449:160: katyaṇuko bhavetkāyaḥ kiṃ nu evaṃ na pṛcchasi || 78 ||
S04n449:161: vahneḥ śikhā katyaṇukā pavane hyaṇavaḥ kati |
S04n449:162: indriye indriye kyanto romakūpe bhruvoḥ kati ||79 ||
S04n449:164: rājyaṃ ca taiḥ kathaṃ rakṣyaṃ mokṣaścaiṣāṃ kathaṃ bhavet || 80 ||
S04n449:165: gadyaṃ padyaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe maithunaṃ lokaviśrutā |
S04n449:167: vajrasaṃhananāḥ kena hyacalā brūhi me katham |
S04n449:169: ghanānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kutra ṛtūnāṃ ca kuto bhavet |
S04n449:171: śobhāśca jinaputrāśca kutra me pṛccha māṃ suta |
S04n449:173: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate |
S04n449:176: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kena tarkaḥ pravartate || 86 ||
S04n449:177: kriyā pravartate kena gamanaṃ brūhi me katham |
S04n449:179: vidārtha tribhavaṃ ko'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet |
S04n449:181: lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchase kena nairātmyaṃ pṛcchase katham |
S04n449:182: garbhā naiyāyikāḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasāḥ || 89 ||
S04n449:187: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa |
S04n449:189: vaṃśaḥ kaste guruḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa |
S04n449:190: uhoḍimā narā yoge kāmadhātau na budhyase || 93 ||
S04n449:191: siddhānto hyakaniṣṭheṣu yuktiṃ pṛcchasi me katham |
S04n449:192: abhijñāṃ laukikāṃ kena kathaṃ bhikṣutvameva ca || 94 ||
S04n449:193: nairmāṇikān vipākasthān buddhān pṛcchasi me katham |
S04n449:196: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa |
S04n449:197: etāṃścānyāṃśca subahūn praśnān pṛcchasi māṃ suta || 96 ||
S04n449:199: siddhāntaṃ deśanāṃ vakṣye sahasā tvaṃ śṛṇohi me || 97 ||
S04n449:200: upanyāsaṃ kariṣyāmi padānāṃ śṛṇu me suta |
S04n449:202: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-katamadbhagavan aṣṭottarapadaśatam ?
S04n449:309: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-katividho bhagavan vijñānānāmutpādasthitinirodho bhavati ?
S04n449:311: na ca tārkikā avabudhyante yaduta prabandhanirodho lakṣaṇanirodhaśca |
S04n449:315: trividhaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ca |
S04n449:316: dvividhaṃ mahāmate vijñānaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa aṣṭalakṣaṇoktaṃ khyātivijñānaṃ vastuprativikalpavijñānaṃ ca |
S04n449:323: tatra sarvendriyavijñānanirodho mahāmate yaduta ālayavijñānasya abhūtaparikalpavāsanāvaicitryanirodhaḥ |
S04n449:331: yadi ca mahāmate mṛtpiṇḍo mṛtparamāṇubhyo'nyaḥ syāt,
S04n449:341: tasmānmahāmate na svajātilakṣaṇanirodho vijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu karmalakṣaṇanirodhaḥ |
S04n449:344: tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate ayaṃ vādo yaduta viṣayagrahaṇoparamādvijñānaprabandhoparamo bhavati |
S04n449:347: na cakṣurvijñānasya rūpālokasamudayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti anyatra kāraṇataḥ |
S04n449:349: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidho bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati yaduta samudayasvabhāvo bhāvasvabhāvo lakṣaṇasvabhāvo mahābhūtasvabhāvo hetusvabhāvaḥ pratyayasvabhāvo niṣpattisvabhāvaśca saptamaḥ ||
S04n449:350: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidhaḥ paramārtho yaduta cittagocaro jñānagocaraḥ prajñāgocaro dṛṣṭidvayagocaro dṛṣṭidvayātikrāntagocaraḥ sutabhūmyanukramaṇagocarastathāgatasya pratyātmagatigocaraḥ ||
S04n449:351: etanmahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvaparamārthahṛdayaṃ yena samanvāgatāstathāgatā laukikalokottaratamān dharmānāryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitān vyavasthāpayanti |
S04n449:352: tathā ca vyavasthāpayanti yathā tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā na bhavanti |
S04n449:357: ye kecinmahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā abhūtvā śraddhāhetuphalābhivyaktidravyaṃ ca kālāvasthitaṃ pratyayeṣu ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmutpādasthitiṃ cecchanti,
S04n449:362: tadyathā mahāmate ghaṭakapālābhāvo ghaṭakṛtyaṃ na karoti,
S04n449:364: evameva mahāmate ye skandhadhātvāyatanabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante,
S04n449:371: teṣāmapi mahāmate trisaṃgatipratyayakriyāyogenopadeśo vidyate hetuphalasvalakṣaṇatayā atītānāgatapratyutpannāsatsallakṣaṇāstitāṃ yuktyāgamaistarkabhūmau vartamānāḥ svadṛṣṭidoṣavāsanatayā nirdekṣyanti |
S04n449:372: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭā viṣamamatayo'jñaiḥ praṇītaṃ sarvapraṇītamiti vakṣyanti ||
S04n449:373: ye punaranye mahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā niḥsvabhāvaghanālātacakragandharvanagarānutpāda-
S04n449:375: nacirātte mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāprāptā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n449:376: mahākaruṇopāyakauśalyānābhogagatena mahāmate prayogena sarvasattvamāyāpratibimbasamatayā anārabdhapratyayatayā adhyātmabāhyaviṣayavimuktatayā cittabāhyādarśanatayā animittādhiṣṭhānānugatā anupūrveṇa bhūmikramasamādhiviṣayānugamanatayā traidhātukasvacittatayā adhimuktitaḥ prativibhāvayamānā māyopamasamādhiṃ pratilabhante |
S04n449:377: svacittanirābhāsamātrāvatāreṇa prajñāpāramitāvihārānuprāptā utpādakriyāyogavirahitāḥ samādhivajrabimbopamaṃ tathāgatakāyānugataṃ tathatānirmāṇānugataṃ balābhijñāvaśitākṛpākaruṇopāyamaṇḍitaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetratīrthyāyatanopagataṃ cittamanomanovijñānarahitaṃ parāvṛttyānuśrayānupūrvakaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ mahāmate te bodhisattvāḥ pratilapsyante |
S04n449:379: anādikālāprapañcadauṣṭhulyavikalpavāsanahetukaṃ tribhavaṃ paśyato nirābhāsabuddhabhūmyanutpādasmaraṇatayā pratyātmāryadharmagatiṃgataḥ svacittavaśavartī anābhogacaryāgatiṃgato viśvarūpamaṇisadṛśaḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sattvacittānupraveśakairnirmāṇavigrahaiścittamātrāvadhāraṇatayā bhūmikramānusaṃghau pratiṣṭhāpayati |
S04n449:380: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svasiddhāntakuśalena bhavitavyam ||
S04n449:381: punarapi mahāmatirāha-deśayatu me bhagavān cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇakusumadharmaparyāyaṃ buddhabodhisattvānuyātaṃ svacittadṛśyagocaravisaṃyojanaṃ sarvabhāṣyayuktitattvalakṣaṇavidāraṇaṃ sarvabuddhapravacanahṛdayaṃ laṅkāpurigirimalaye nivāsino bodhisattvānārabhyodadhitaraṃgālayavijñānagocaraṃ dharmakāyaṃ tathāgatānugītaṃ prabhāṣasva ||
S04n449:382: atha khalu bhagavān punareva mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-caturbhirmahāmate kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate |
S04n449:387: evaṃ sarvandriyaparamāṇuromakūpeṣu yugapatpravṛttikramaviṣayādarśabimbadarśanavat udadheḥ pavanāhatā iva mahāmate viṣayapavanacittodadhitaraṃgā avyucchinnahetukriyālakṣaṇā anyonyavinirmuktāḥ karmajātilakṣaṇasuvinibaddharūpasvabhāvānavadhāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyāḥ pravartante |
S04n449:388: saha taireva mahāmate pañcabhirvijñānakāyairhetuviṣayaparicchedalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ nāma manovijñānaṃ taddhetujaśarīraṃ pravartate |
S04n449:389: na ca teṣāṃ tasya caivaṃ bhavati-vayamatrānyonyahetukāḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpābhiniveśapravṛttā iti ||
S04n449:391: tathā ca pravartamānāḥ pravartante yathā samāpannasyāpi yoginaḥ sūkṣmagativāsanāpravṛttā na prajñāyante |
S04n449:392: yogināṃ caivaṃ bhavati-nirodhya vijñānāni samāpatsyāmahe iti |
S04n449:395: evaṃ sūkṣmo mahāmate ālayavijñānagatipracāro yattathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bhūmipratiṣṭhitāṃśca bodhisattvān,
S04n449:399: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate yoginā kalyāṇamitrajinayoge yogaḥ prārabdhavyaḥ ||
S04n449:400: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04n449:405: nīle rakte'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare |
S04n449:407: na cānyena ca nānanyena taraṃgā hyudadhermatāḥ |
S04n449:408: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutāḥ || 102 ||
S04n449:410: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate || 103 ||
S04n449:412: abhinnalakṣaṇā hyaṣṭau na lakṣyā na ca lakṣaṇam || 104 ||
S04n449:414: vijñānānāṃ tathā cittaiḥ pariṇāmo na labhyate || 105 ||
S04n449:415: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate |
S04n449:420: vṛttiśca varṇyate cittaṃ lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśān || 108 ||
S04n449:421: na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam |
S04n449:422: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate || 109 ||
S04n449:426: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gamyate || 111 ||
S04n449:430: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān || 113 ||
S04n449:432: bhāṣase yadi vā tattvaṃ citte tattvaṃ na vidyate || 114 ||
S04n449:433: udadheryathā taraṃgā hi darpaṇe supine yathā |
S04n449:437: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite |
S04n449:440: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na bhūmau na ca bhājane |
S04n449:446: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate |
S04n449:450: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti vai || 121 ||
S04n449:453: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpagocaraṃ parijñātukāmena saṃgaṇikāasaṃsargamiddhanivaraṇavigatena bhavitavyam |
S04n449:457: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittavijñānaprajñālakṣaṇavyavasthāyāṃ sthitvā upariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
S04n449:460: yānyadhigamya yogī khañjagardabha iva cittaprajñājñānalakṣaṇaṃ hitvā jinasutāṣṭamīṃ prāpya bhūmiṃ taduttare lakṣaṇatraye yogamāpadyate ||
S04n449:464: etanmahāmate āryāṇāṃ lakṣaṇatrayaṃ yenāryeṇa lakṣatrayeṇa samanvāgatā āryāḥ svapratyātmāryajñānagatigocaramadhigacchanti |
S04n449:466: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punareva tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya āryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhito bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchati sma-deśayatu me bhagavānāryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamaṣṭottarapadaśataprabhedāśrayam,
S04n449:467: yamāśritya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedaṃ deśayanti,
S04n449:468: yena parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedena suprativibhāgaviddhena pudgaladharmanairātmyapracāraṃ prativiśodhya bhūmiṣu kṛtavidyāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakaradhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhamatikramya tathāgatācintyaviṣayapracāragatipracāraṃ pañcadharmasvabhāvagativinivṛttaṃ tathāgataṃ dharmakāyaṃ prajñājñānasunibaddhadharmaṃ māyāviṣayābhinivṛttaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetratuṣitabhavanākaniṣṭhālayopagaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ pratilabheran ||
S04n449:469: bhagavānāha-iha mahāmate eke tīrthyātīrthyadṛṣṭayo nāstitvābhiniviṣṭā vikalpabuddhihetukṣayasvabhāvābhāvānnāsti śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ vikalpayanti |
S04n449:472: anye punarmahāmate bhūtaguṇāṇudravyasaṃsthānasaṃniveśaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāstiśaśaśṛṅgābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā asti gośṛṅgamiti kalpayanti |
S04n449:475: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpamātre mahāmate śaśaśṛṅgaṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayettathā mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayitavyam ||
S04n449:476: ye punarmahāmate nāstyastivinivṛttā nāsti śaśaśṛṅgaṃ na kalpayanti,
S04n449:479: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-nanu bhagavan vikalpasyāpravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anumimīmahe vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam |
S04n449:480: bhagavānāha- na hi mahāmate vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam |
S04n449:490: atha na bhavati mahāmate apekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya astitvamapekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ viṣamahetutvānmahāmate nāstyastitvam siddhirna bhavati nāstyastitvavādinām |
S04n449:491: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭayo rūpakāraṇasaṃsthānābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā ākāśabhāvāparicchedakuśalā rūpamākāśabhāvavigataṃ paricchedaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpayanti |
S04n449:495: bhūtāni mahāmate pravartamānāni parasparasvalakṣaṇabhedabhinnāni ākāśe cāpratiṣṭhitāni |
S04n449:497: evameva śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ mahāmate goviṣāṇamapekṣya bhavati |
S04n449:498: goviṣāṇaṃ punarmahāmate aṇuśo vibhajyamānaṃ punarapyaṇavo vibhajyamānā aṇutvalakṣaṇe nāvatiṣṭhante |
S04n449:502: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-śaśagośṛṅgākāśarūpapadṛṣṭivikalpavigatena mahāmate bhavitavyam,
S04n449:506: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04n449:507: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpravartate |
S04n449:513: aṇuśo bhajyamānaṃ hi naiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet |
S04n449:517: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi svacittadṛśyadhārāviśuddhyarthaṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā ?
S04n449:518: bhagavānāha-kramavṛttyā mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati na yugapat |
S04n449:519: tadyathā mahāmate āmraphalāni kramaśaḥ pacyante na yugapat,
S04n449:520: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā sattvānāṃ kramaśo viśudhyati na yugapat |
S04n449:521: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāraḥ kramaśo bhāṇḍāni kurute na yugapat,
S04n449:522: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ kramaśo viśodhayati na yugapat |
S04n449:523: tadyathā mahāmate pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ kramavṛttyā virohanti na yugapat,
S04n449:524: evameva mahāmate sattvānāṃ tathāgataḥ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat |
S04n449:525: tadyathā mahāmate hāsyalāsyagītavāditravīṇālekhyayogyāḥ kramaśaḥ pravartante na yugapat,
S04n449:526: evemeva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat |
S04n449:527: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsāḥ saṃdṛśyante nirvikalpā yugapat,
S04n449:528: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ yugapattathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayati nirvikalpāṃ nirābhāsagocarām |
S04n449:529: tadyathā mahāmate somādityamaṇḍalaṃ yugapatsarvarūpāvabhāsān kiraṇaiḥ prakāśayati,
S04n449:530: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ svacittadṛśyadauṣṭhulyavāsanāvigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ yugapadacintyajñānajinagocaraviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayati |
S04n449:532: evameva mahāmate niṣyandabuddho yugapatsattvagocaraṃ paripācya ākaniṣṭhabhavanavimānālayayogaṃ yogināmarpayati |
S04n449:538: tathā khyāyannapi mahāmate tadātmako na bhavati,
S04n449:539: evameva mahāmate paratantrasvabhāve parikalpitasvabhāve vividhavikalpacittavicitralakṣaṇaṃ khyāyate |
S04n449:549: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dvividhaṃ śrāvakayānanayaprabhedalakṣaṇaṃ yaduta pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ ca |
S04n449:552: svacittaṃ samādhāya dhyānavimokṣasamādhimārgaphalasamāpattivimuktivāsanācintyapariṇaticyutivigataṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhavihāraṃ mahāmate adhigacchanti śrāvakāḥ |
S04n449:554: etaddhi mahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryādhigamavihārasukhamadhigamya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nirodhasukhaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ ca sattvakriyāpekṣayā pūrvasvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtatayā ca na sākṣātkaraṇīyam |
S04n449:555: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhaṃ yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhe na śikṣitavyam |
S04n449:557: yaduta nīlapītoṣṇadravacalakaṭhināni mahābhūtānyakriyāpravṛttāni svasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktyāgamapramāṇasuvinibaddhāni dṛṣṭvā tatsvabhāvābhiniveśavikalpaḥ pravartate |
S04n449:562: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-nityamacintyaṃ ca bhagavatā pratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ paramārthagocaraṃ ca prabhāṣitam |
S04n449:564: bhagavānāha-na mahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇasya nityācintyatāṃ prāpnoti |
S04n449:571: mama tu mahāmate paramārthanityācintyaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇahetuyuktaṃ bhāvābhāvavigataṃ pratyātmāryādhigamalakṣaṇatvāllakṣaṇavatparamārthajñānahetutvācca hetumadbhāvābhāvavigatatvādakṛtakākāśanirvāṇanirodhadṛṣṭāntasādharmyānnityam |
S04n449:574: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nityācintyapratyātmāryajñānādhigamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ||
S04n449:577: yadi punarmahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ nityācintyatā kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā anumānabuddhyā nityaṃ samāpyate,
S04n449:578: tenaiva hetunā mamāpi mahāmate kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā nityamahetūpadeśāt ||
S04n449:583: yaduta vāgvikalpamātraṃ hi mahāmate śaśaviṣāṇaṃ svahetulakṣaṇābhāvāt |
S04n449:590: saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣajñāḥ sarvabhāvavikalpābhāvādindriyāṇāmanāgataviṣayoparamācca mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti na pratyātmagativijñānālayaṃ parāvṛttipūrvakaṃ mahāmate |
S04n449:593: ataste mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ svacittadṛśyagocarānabhijñā bāhyacittadṛśyagocarābhiniviṣṭāḥ |
S04n449:602: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgatisvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ mahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena pravartamānaṃ bālā utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭidvayapatitāśayā utpādaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadasatorvikalpayanti |
S04n449:606: yaduta śrāvakayānābhisamayagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraṃ tathāgatayānābhisamayagotram aniyataikataragotram agotraṃ ca pañcamam |
S04n449:612: yaḥ śrāvakayānābhisamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭpañcamyāṃ bhūmau paryutthānakleśaprahīṇo vāsanakleśāprahīṇo'cintyācyutigataḥ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati-kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
S04n449:616: anye punarmahāmate kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti |
S04n449:619: atra te mahāmate kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ||
S04n449:623: sa pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraka iti viditvā pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayānurūpā kathā karaṇīyā |
S04n449:628: yadā punarmahāmate trayāṇāmapyeṣāmanyatame deśyamāne svacittadṛśyadehālabhogapratiṣṭhācintyaviṣaye deśyamāne notrasati na saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S04n449:631: aniyatagotrakaḥ punarmahāmate triṣvapyeteṣu deśyamāneṣu yatrānunīyate tatrānuyojyaḥ syāt |
S04n449:634: pratyātmālaye tu svakleśavāsanāśuddhasya dharmanairātmyadarśanātsamādhisukhavihāraṃ prāpya śrāvako jinakāyatāṃ pratilapsyate ||
S04n449:635: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04n449:647: yaduta bodhisattvapiṭakanikṣepo'bhyākhyānaṃ ca naite sūtrāntā vinayamokṣānukūlā iti bruvataḥ sarvakuśalamūlotsargatvānna nirvāyate |
S04n449:648: dvitīyaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhavapraṇidhānopāyapūrvakatvānnāparinirvṛtaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ parinirvāsyāmīti tato na parinirvāti |
S04n449:650: punarapi mahāmatirāha-katamo'tra bhagavan atyantato na parinirvāti ?
S04n449:651: bhagavānāha-bodhisattvecchantiko'tra mahāmate ādiparinirvṛtān sarvadharmān viditvā atyantato na parinirvāti |
S04n449:655: yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ |
S04n449:657: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svabhāvalakṣaṇatrayakuśalena bhavitavyam |
S04n449:662: parikalpitasvabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā nāmābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca nāmavastunimittābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca |
S04n449:664: nimittalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ punaryaduta teṣveva ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu svasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānāvabodhaḥ |
S04n449:673: eṣa mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇapravicayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ,
S04n449:675: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nairātmyadvayalakṣaṇapravicayakuśalena bhavitavyam |
S04n449:677: yaduta ātmātmīyarahitaskandhadhātvāyatanakadambamajñānakarmatṛṣṇāprabhavaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpādigrahaṇābhiniveśātpravartamānaṃ vijñānaṃ sarvendriyaiḥ svacittadṛśyabhājanadehālayasvacittavikalpavikalpitaṃ vijñāpayati |
S04n449:683: yathā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanānyātmavirahitāni skandhasamūhamātraṃ hetukarmatṛṣṇāsūtropanibaddhamanyonyapratyayatayā pravartate nirīham,
S04n449:684: tathā skandhā api mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇavirahitā abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇavicitraprabhāvitā bālairvikalpyante na tvāryaiḥ |
S04n449:685: cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvarahitān mahāmate sarvadharmān vibhāvayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanairātmyakuśalo bhavati |
S04n449:686: dharmanairātmyakuśalaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nacirātprathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ nirābhāsapravicayāṃ pratilabhate |
S04n449:688: sa tasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito'nekaratnamuktopaśobhite mahāpadmarāje padmakṛtau mahāratnavimāne māyāsvabhāvagocaraparicayābhinirvṛtte niṣaṇṇaḥ tadanurūpairjinaputraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrāgatairbuddhapāṇyabhiṣekaiścakravartiputravadabhiṣicyate |
S04n449:693: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-samāropāpavādalakṣaṇaṃ me bhagavān deśayatu yathāhaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāḥ samāropāpavādakudṛṣṭivarjitamatayaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran |
S04n449:695: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04n449:699: atha khalu bhagavānetameva gāthārthamuddyotayan punarapyetadavocat-caturvidho mahāmate asatsamāropaḥ |
S04n449:713: asaddhetusamāropaḥ punarmahāmate yaduta ahetusamutpannaṃ prāgvijñānaṃ paścādabhūtvā māyāvadanutpannaṃ pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpālokasmṛtipūrvakaṃ pravartate |
S04n449:724: parikalpitasvabhāvā iva paratantrāśayā viśvarūpacintāmaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanmaṇḍalagatā māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratibimbodakacandragatisamānutpādabhaṅgaśāśvatocchedarahitān sarvadharmān saṃmukhaṃ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānavirahān dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04n449:726: yāvadanekāni samādhikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhyaḥ taiḥ samādhibhiḥ kṣetrātkṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti |
S04n449:727: buddhapūjābhiyuktāśca sarvopapattidevabhavanālayeṣu ratnatrayamupadeśya buddharūpamāsthāya śrāvakagaṇabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraṇatayā bāhyabhāvābhāvopadeśaṃ kurvanti sadasatpakṣavinivṛttyartham ||
S04n449:732: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu bhagavān śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
S04n449:733: yena śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāstyastivikalpavarjitāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran ||
S04n449:734: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
S04n449:735: tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
S04n449:737: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n449:741: yaduta lakṣaṇaśūnyatā bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā apracaritaśūnyatā pracaritaśūnyatā sarvadharmanirabhilāpyaśūnyatā paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā itaretaraśūnyatā ca saptamī ||
S04n449:748: yaduta svayaṃ svabhāvābhāvotpattito mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhavati sarvadharmāṇām |
S04n449:754: yaduta skandhā ātmātmīyarahitā hetuyuktikriyākarmayogaiḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante |
S04n449:764: tadyathā mahāmate śṛgālamātuḥ prāsāde hastigavaiḍakādyā na santi |
S04n449:767: na ca punarmahāmate prāsādaḥ prāsādabhāvato nāsti,
S04n449:769: na ca te'nyatra hastigavaiḍakādyā bhāvā nāvatiṣṭhante |
S04n449:777: na ca punarmahāmate te notpadyante anyatra samādhyavasthāyām |
S04n449:785: na yatra mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ tatra saṃsāraḥ |
S04n449:790: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
S04n449:792: saṃsāraṃ svapnamāyākhyaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati || 135 ||
S04n449:795: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-etaddhi mahāmate śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvasūtrāntagatam |
S04n449:801: evameva mahāmate sarvasūtrāntadeśanā dharmā bālānāṃ svavikalpasaṃtoṣaṇam,
S04n449:803: tasmāttarhi mahāmate arthānusāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ na deśanābhilāpābhiniviṣṭena ||
S04n449:804: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarbhagavatā sūtrāntapāṭhe'nuvarṇitaḥ |
S04n449:805: sa ca kila tvayā prakṛtiprabhāsvaraviśuddhyādiviśuddha eva varṇyate dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ sarvasattvadehāntargataḥ |
S04n449:806: mahārghamūlyaratnaṃ malinavastupariveṣṭitamiva skandhadhātvāyatanavastuveṣṭito rāgadveṣamohābhūtaparikalpamalamalino nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataśca bhagavatā varṇitaḥ |
S04n449:808: tīrthakarā api bhagavan nityaḥ kartā nirguṇo vibhuravyaya ityātmavādopadeśaṃ kurvanti ||
S04n449:809: bhagavānāha-na hi mahāmate tīrthakarātmavādatulyo mama tathāgatagarbhopadeśaḥ |
S04n449:810: kiṃ tu mahāmate tathāgatāḥ śūnyatābhūtakoṭinirvāṇānutpādānimittāpraṇihitādyānāṃ mahāmate padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bālānāṃ nairātmyasaṃtrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ nirvikalpanirābhāsagocaraṃ tathāgatagarbhamukhopadeśena deśayanti |
S04n449:811: na cātra mahāmate anāgatapratyutpannaiḥ bodhisattvairmahāsattvairātmābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ |
S04n449:812: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervividhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti hastaśilpadaṇḍodakasūtraprayatnayogāt,
S04n449:813: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāstadeva dharmanairātmyaṃ sarvavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairgarbhopadeśena vā nairātmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ padavyañjanaparyāyairdeśayante |
S04n449:815: evaṃ hi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhopadeśamātmavādābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tīrthakarāṇāmākarṣaṇārthaṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśena nirdiśanti-kathaṃ bata abhūtātmavikalpadṛṣṭipatitāśayā vimokṣatrayagocarapatitāśayopetāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeranniti |
S04n449:816: etadarthaṃ mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kurvanti |
S04n449:818: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivinivṛttyarthaṃ tathāgatanairātmyagarbhānusāriṇā ca te bhavitavyam ||
S04n449:822: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo'nāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān yogābhisamayaṃ yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti |
S04n449:823: bhagavānāha-caturbhirmahāmate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti |
S04n449:825: yaduta svacittadṛśyavibhāvanatayā ca utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjanatayā ca bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇatayā ca svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamābhilakṣaṇatayā ca |
S04n449:826: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti ||
S04n449:827: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati ?
S04n449:828: yaduta sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate-svacittamātramidaṃ traidhātukamātmātmīyarahitaṃ nirīhamāyūhaniyūhavigatamanādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavāsanābhiniveśavāsitaṃ traidhātukavicitrarūpopacāropanibaddhaṃ dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpānugataṃ vikalpyate khyāyate ca |
S04n449:829: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati ||
S04n449:830: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati ?
S04n449:832: svacittamātrānusāritvādbāhyabhāvābhāvadarśanādvijñānānāmapravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyayānāmakūṭarāśitvaṃ ca vikalpapratyayodbhavaṃ traidhātukaṃ paśyanto'dhyātmabāhyasarvadharmānupalabdhibhirniḥsvabhāvadarśanādutpādadṛṣṭivinivṛttau māyādidharmasvabhāvānugamādanutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante |
S04n449:836: tadyathā mahāmate mano'pratihataṃ girikuḍyanadīvṛkṣādiṣvanekāni yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭānubhūtān viṣayānanusmaran svacittaprabandhāvicchinnaśarīramapratihatagati pravartate,
S04n449:837: evameva mahāmate manomayakāyasahapratilambhena māyopamasamena samādhinā balavaśitābhijñānalakṣaṇakusumitamāryagatinikāyasahajo mana iva pravartate'pratihatagatiḥ pūrvapraṇidhānaviṣayānanusmaran sattvaparipākārtham |
S04n449:838: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati ||
S04n449:839: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇakuśalo bhavati ?
S04n449:842: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti |
S04n449:844: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān hetupratyayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
S04n449:845: yena hetupratyayalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sadasaddṛṣṭivikalparahitāḥ sarvabhāvanākramaṃ yugapadutpattiṃ na kalpayeyuḥ ||
S04n449:846: bhagavānāha-dviprakāraṃ mahāmate pratītyasamutpādahetulakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta bāhyaṃ ca ādhyātmikaṃ ca |
S04n449:854: evameva mahāmate bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pūrvottarottaro draṣṭavyam ||
S04n449:855: tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo yaduta avidyā tṛṣā karmetyevamādyā mahāmate dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante |
S04n449:856: ebhya utpannā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanākhyā dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante |
S04n449:865: vyañjanahetuḥ punarmahāmate utpannasya vikalpasya bhāvasya lakṣaṇoddyotanakṛtyaṃ karoti pradīpavadrūpādīnām |
S04n449:867: ete hi mahāmate svavikalpakalpitā bālapṛthagjanairna kramavṛttyā na yugapatpravartante |
S04n449:883: yatra bālā vikalpanti pratyayaiḥ sa nivāryate || 139 ||
S04n449:888: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate || 141 ||
S04n449:889: na cotpādyaṃ na cotpannaḥ pratyayo'pi na kiṃcana |
S04n449:891: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavān vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayena bhagavan suprativibhāgavinibaddhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayeyuḥ |
S04n449:895: sādhu bhagavan iti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n449:902: etaddhi mahāmate caturvidhaṃ vāgvikalpalakṣaṇamiti me yaduktam,
S04n449:904: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametamevārthamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān punarapi vāgvikalpābhivyaktigocaram |
S04n449:905: kutra kasmāt kathaṃ kena bhagavan nṛṇāṃ vāgvijñaptivikalpaḥ pravartate ?
S04n449:907: mahāmatirāha-kiṃ punarbhagavan vāg vikalpādanyā uta ananyā ?
S04n449:908: bhagavānāha-na hi mahāmate vāg vikalpādanyā nānanyā |
S04n449:935: bhavaṃ parīkṣeta na saṃsāre nāpi nirvāyāt || 144 ||
S04n449:937: pralobhya krīḍayitvā ca bhūtān dadyāttato mṛgān || 145 ||
S04n449:940: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavān nāstyastitvaikatvānyatvobhayanobhayanaivāstinanāstinityānityavarjitaṃ sarvatīrthyāgatipracāramāryapratyātmajñānagatigamyaṃ parikalpitasvasāmānyalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ paramārthatattvāvatāraṃ bhūmyanusaṃdhikramottarottaraviśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ tathāgatabhūmyanupraveśalakṣaṇamanābhogapūrvapraṇidhānaviśvarūpamaṇisadṛśaviṣayānantalakṣaṇapracāraṃ svacittadṛśyagocaragativibhāgalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām |
S04n449:941: yathā ca ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evamādiṣu parikalpitasvabhāvasvasāmānya lakṣaṇavinivṛttadṛṣṭayaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpattīḥ paripūrayema ||
S04n449:945: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mahāmate pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S04n449:947: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
S04n449:949: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n449:951: tadyathā mahāmate mṛgatṛṣṇodakaṃ mṛgā udakabhāvena vikalpya grīṣmābhitaptāḥ pātukāmatayā pradhāvanti,
S04n449:953: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā anādikālavividhaprapañcavikalpavāsitamatayo rāgadveṣamohāgnitāpitamanaso vicitrarūpaviṣayābhilāṣiṇaḥ utpādabhaṅgasthitidṛṣṭyāśayā ādhyātmikabāhyabhāvābhāvākuśalāḥ |
S04n449:959: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣaḥ śayitaḥ svapnāntare strīpuruṣahastyaśvarathapadātigrāmanagaranigamagomahiṣavanodyānavividhagirinadītaḍāgopaśobhitaṃ janapadamantaḥpuraṃ praviśya prativibudhyeta |
S04n449:961: tatkiṃ manyase mahāmate-api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet,
S04n449:964: bhagavānāha-evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭāstīrthyamatayaḥ svapnatulyātsvacittadṛśyabhāvānna prativijānante,
S04n449:966: tadyathā mahāmate citrakarakṛtapradeśā animnonnatāḥ santo nimnonnatā bālaiḥ kalpyante,
S04n449:968: te ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭā anyānapi sadasatpakṣaviviktānutpādavādino nāstikā iti vakṣyanti |
S04n449:972: tadyathā mahāmate taimirikāḥ keśoṇḍukaṃ dṛṣṭvā parasparamācakṣate-iadaṃ citramidaṃ citramiti paśyantu bho mārṣāḥ |
S04n449:973: tacca keśoṇḍukamubhayānutpannatayā na bhāvo nābhāvo darśanādarśanataḥ |
S04n449:974: evameva mahāmate tīrthyakudṛṣṭivikalpāśayābhiniviṣṭāḥ sadasatpakṣaikatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ saddharmāpavādakā ātmānaṃ parāṃśca vinipātayiṣyanti |
S04n449:975: tadyathā mahāmate acakramalātacakraṃ bālaiścakrabhāvena parikalpyate na paṇḍitaiḥ,
S04n449:976: evameva mahāmate kudṛṣṭitīrthyāśayapatitā ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvaṃ parikalpayiṣyanti sarvabhāvotpattau |
S04n449:977: tadyathā mahāmate deve pravarṣati jalabudbudakāḥ sphaṭikamaṇisadṛśāḥ khyāyante |
S04n449:979: te ca mahāmate udakabudbudakā na maṇayo nāmaṇayo grahaṇāgrahaṇataḥ |
S04n449:980: evameva mahāmate tīrthyadṛṣṭivikalpāśayavāsanāvāsitā asataścotpādaṃ varṇayiṣyanti pratyayaiḥ,
S04n449:982: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti |
S04n449:983: na ca mahāmate cittamano manovijñānacittaparāvṛttyāśrayāṇāṃ svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tathāgatabhūmipratyātmāryajñānagatānāṃ yogināṃ bhāvābhāvasaṃjñā pravartate |
S04n449:985: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt |
S04n449:991: sā ca na cchāyā nācchāyā vṛkṣasaṃsthānāsaṃsthānataḥ,
S04n449:993: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāni sarvarūpapratibimbakāni khyāyante yathāpratyayataḥ svavikalpanācca,
S04n449:995: atha ca te mahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpāḥ khyāyante bālānāṃ bimbākṛtayaḥ |
S04n449:998: sā ca na bhāvā nābhāvā ghoṣāghoṣaśravaṇataḥ,
S04n449:1001: te ca na bhāvā nābhāvā lobhyālobhyataḥ |
S04n449:1003: tadyathā mahāmate vetālayantrapuruṣau niḥsattvau piśācayuktigātspandanakriyāṃ kurvāte |
S04n449:1004: tatra ca asadvikalpe bālā abhiniviśante gamanāgamanataḥ |
S04n449:1015: mṛgā gṛhṇanti pānīyaṃ na cāsyāṃ vastu vidyate || 149 ||
S04n449:1017: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā || 150 ||
S04n449:1019: bālaḥ kīle yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartayet || 151 ||
S04n449:1026: cittaṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca |
S04n449:1027: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaḥ khyāti vai nṛṇām || 155 ||
S04n449:1030: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca |
S04n449:1031: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu bimbaṃ nāsti ca kutracid || 157 ||
S04n449:1032: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe |
S04n449:1038: punaraparaṃ mahāmate kleśajñeyāvaraṇadvayaviśuddhyarthaṃ sārthavāhavadānupūrvyā aṣṭottare nirābhāsapadaśate pratiṣṭhāpayanti yānabhūmyaṅgasuvibhāgalakṣaṇe ca ||
S04n449:1047: evamidaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nānyatheti paśyataḥ pūrvottarottarata ā saṃjñānirodhādbālopacārikaṃ bhavati |
S04n449:1059: nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthamārgaṃ nayanti te |
S04n449:1063: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugam || 162 ||
S04n449:1064: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate |
S04n449:1071: tatrānucchedo yaduta sarvārthā atītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ pratyātmamapi gacchanti,
S04n449:1073: punarmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśo na maraṇam |
S04n449:1078: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśaṃ na maraṇam |
S04n449:1089: punaraparaṃ mahāmate adhiṣṭhānadvayādhiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ caraṇayornipatya praśnān paripṛcchanti |
S04n449:1092: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyante |
S04n449:1093: samanantarasamāpannānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim,
S04n449:1094: atha daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mukhānyupadarśya sarvakāyamukhavācāsaṃdarśanenādhiṣṭhānaṃ kurvanti |
S04n449:1095: yathā mahāmate vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ ca tādṛglakṣaṇaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S04n449:1096: evaṃ mahāmate prathamāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samādhisamāpattyadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratilabhante |
S04n449:1097: kalpaśatasahasraṃ saṃcitaiḥ kuśalamūlairanupūrveṇa bhūmipakṣavipakṣalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau mahāpadmavimānāsanasthasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tadanurūpairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtasya sarvaratnābharaṇavibhūṣitakirīṭasya haritālakanakacampakacandrāṃśumayūkhapadmasadṛśā daśadiglokadhātvāgatā jinakarāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya padmavimānāsanasthasya mūrdhanyabhiṣiñcanti vaśavarticakravartīndrarājavatsarvakāyamukhapāṇyabhiṣekena |
S04n449:1098: sa ca bodhisattvaste ca bodhisattvāḥ pāṇyabhiṣekādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā ityucyante |
S04n449:1102: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yatkiṃcidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratibhāti samādhyṛddhideśanākāreṇa,
S04n449:1104: yadi punarmahāmate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānamantareṇa pratibhānaṃ pratibhāyāt,
S04n449:1108: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣaparvatā api mahāmate vividhāni ca vādyabhāṇḍāni nagarabhavanagṛhavimānāsanasthānāni tathāgatapraveśādhiṣṭhānena pravādyante |
S04n449:1109: kiṃ punarmahāmate sacetanā mūkāndhabadhirā api mahāmate svadoṣebhyo vimucyante |
S04n449:1111: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha-kiṃ punarbhagavaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samādhisamāpattyavasthānakāle viśeṣabhūmau ca abhiṣekādhiṣṭhānaṃ prakurvanti ?
S04n449:1112: bhagavānāha-mārakarmakleśaviyuktārthaṃ śrāvakadhyānabhūmyaprapatanatayā ca tathāgatabhūmipratyātmādhigamanatayā ca prāptadharmādhigamavivṛddhaye ca |
S04n449:1113: etena mahāmate kāraṇena tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānairadhitiṣṭhanti |
S04n449:1114: anadhiṣṭhitāśca mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kutīrthyaśrāvakamārāśayapatitā nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran |
S04n449:1119: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-pratītyasamutpādaṃ punarbhagavatā deśayatā kāraṇavyapadeśa eva kṛto na svanayaprakṛtyavasthānakathā |
S04n449:1120: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇata utpattiṃ varṇayanti,
S04n449:1131: kiṃ tu tīrthakaravyapadeśa eva bhagavan viśiṣyate na tvadīyam |
S04n449:1134: tava tu bhagavan kāraṇamapi kāryāpekṣaṃ kāryamapi kāraṇāpekṣam |
S04n449:1136: ahetutvaṃ ca bhagavan lokasya-asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ |
S04n449:1137: bhagavānāha-na mahāmate mamāhetukakāraṇavādo hetupratyayasaṃkaraśca prasajyate-asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ,
S04n449:1140: ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātraṃ nāvabudhyante bāhyasvaviṣayabhāvābhāvatvena,
S04n449:1150: te ca mahāmate na bhāvā nābhāvāḥ,
S04n449:1165: yathā mahāmate animiṣāyāṃ gandhasugandhāyāṃ ca lokadhātau samantabhadrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre animiṣairnetraiḥ prekṣamāṇāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante anyāṃśca samādhiviśeṣān,
S04n449:1168: iha loke kṛmimakṣikaivamādyāḥ sattvaviśeṣā anabhilāpenaiva svakṛtyaṃ kurvanti ||
S04n449:1170: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca |
S04n449:1174: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-nityaśabdaḥ punarbhagavan kvabhihitaḥ ?
S04n449:1191: na hi mahāmate bhrāntirvividhavicitranimittavikalpena vikalpyamānā bhedamupayāti |
S04n449:1194: yena punaḥ kāraṇena mahāmate āryāṇāmasyāṃ bhrāntau viparyāsabuddhirna pravartate,
S04n449:1196: nānyatra mahāmate āryā asyāṃ bhrāntau yakiṃcitsaṃjñino bhavanti nāryajñānavastusaṃjñinaḥ |
S04n449:1198: sā punarbhrāntirviparyāsāviparyāsena vikalpyamānā gotradvayāvahā bhavati yaduta āryagotrasya vā bālapṛthagjanagotrasya vā |
S04n449:1200: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā śrāvakayānagotraṃ janayati ?
S04n449:1202: evaṃ mahāmate sā bhrāntiḥ śrāvakayānagotrāvahā bhavati |
S04n449:1203: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati ?
S04n449:1204: yaduta tasyā eva mahāmate bhrānteḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśāsaṃsargataḥ pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati |
S04n449:1205: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate paṇḍitaiḥ saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati ?
S04n449:1215: asyaiva mahāmate padasyābhidyotanārthamidamuktaṃ mayā-kalpanaiśca vivarjitaṃ sarvakalpanāvirahitamiti yāvaduktaṃ bhavati ||
S04n449:1230: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare |
S04n449:1232: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi |
S04n449:1236: mahāmatirāha-kiṃ punarbhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
S04n449:1238: tadyadi bhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
S04n449:1242: na hi bhagavan kaściddheturasti yena rūpaṃ vicitralakṣaṇākāraṃ khyāyate māyāvat |
S04n449:1245: kiṃ tarhi mahāmate vitathāśuvidyutsadṛśasādharmyeṇa sarvadharmā māyopamāḥ |
S04n449:1246: tadyathā mahāmate vidyullatā kṣaṇabhaṅgadṛṣṭanaṣṭadarśanaṃ punarbālānāṃ khyāyate,
S04n449:1247: evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ svavikalpasāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ pravicayābhāvānna khyāyante rūpalakṣaṇābhiniveśataḥ ||
S04n449:1252: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣaḥ prasajyate,
S04n449:1254: bhagavānāha-na mahāmate mamānutpādaṃ bhāvānāṃ māyopamatvenābhilapataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣo bhavati |
S04n449:1258: tīrthakaramohavargā hi mahāmate sadasatorbhāvānāmutpattimicchanti na svavikalpavicitrābhiniveśapratyayataḥ |
S04n449:1261: bhāvopadeśaḥ punarmahāmate saṃsāraparigrahārthaṃ ca nāstītyucchedanivāraṇārthaṃ ca |
S04n449:1263: māyābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇanirdeśena mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyāvṛttyarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ kṛdṛṣṭilakṣaṇapatitāśayānāṃ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāriṇāṃ hetupratyayakriyotpattilakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭhānāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ māyāsvapnasvabhāvalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān deśayāmi |
S04n449:1264: ete bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭilakṣaṇāśayābhiniviṣṭā ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca sarvadharmā yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanādvisaṃvādayiṣyanti |
S04n449:1265: tatra yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanaṃ mahāmate sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraḥ ||
S04n449:1270: yairnāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ sūpalakṣitairbodhisattvā mahāsattvā arthapadavyañjanānusāriṇaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya tathaiva sarvasattvānavabodhayiṣyanti |
S04n449:1271: tatra mahāmate kāyo nāma yaduta yadvastvāśritya nāma kriyate,
S04n449:1281: nāma punarmahāmate yaduta akṣarāṇāṃ ca nāmasvabhāvabhedo'kārādyāvaddhakāraḥ |
S04n449:1283: tatra padakāyāḥ punarmahāmate ye padavīthīgāmino hastyaśvanaramṛgapaśugomahiṣājaiḍakādyāḥ padakāyasaṃjñāṃ labhante |
S04n449:1284: nāma ca vyañjanaṃ ca punarmahāmate catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ |
S04n449:1290: vyañjane padakāye ca nāmni cāpi viśeṣataḥ |
S04n449:1291: bālāḥ sajjanti durmedhā mahāpaṅke yathā gajāḥ || 170 ||
S04n449:1292: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yuktihetubuddhivaikalyātkutārkikā durvidagdhamatayo'nāgate'dhvani pṛṣṭā vidvadbhirekatvānyatvobhayānubhayadṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinirmuktamantadvayavidhiṃ pṛcchadbhirevaṃ vakṣyanti-apraśnamidaṃ nedaṃ yoniśa iti,
S04n449:1294: evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskārebhyo lakṣaṇāllakṣaṇaṃ guṇebhyo guṇī bhūtebhyo bhautikaṃ dṛśyāddarśanaṃ pāṃśubhyo'ṇavo jñānādyoginaḥ,
S04n449:1295: evamādyenottarottarakramalakṣaṇavidhinā avyākṛtāni pṛṣṭāḥ sthāpanīyaṃ bhagavatā avyākṛtamiti vakṣyanti |
S04n449:1296: na tu te mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti yathā śrotṝṇāṃ buddhivaikalyāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na vyākurvanti |
S04n449:1297: avyākṛtānyapi ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivādavyudāsārthaṃ nopadiśyante tathāgataiḥ |
S04n449:1298: tīrthakarā hi mahāmate evaṃvādinaḥ-yaduta sa jīvastaccharīram,
S04n449:1301: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate kāraṇavisaṃmūḍhānāmavyākṛtaṃ na tu matpravacane |
S04n449:1302: matpravacane tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakavisaṃyukte vikalpo na pravartate |
S04n449:1304: ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāritamatayasteṣāṃ sthāpyaṃ bhavati |
S04n449:1305: caturvidhapadapraśnavyākaraṇena mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti |
S04n449:1306: sthāpanīyamiti mahāmate kālāntaradeśanaiṣā mayā kṛtā aparipakvendriyāṇām |
S04n449:1313: tatra anāyūhāniryūhāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena ?
S04n449:1320: tatra anityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇenocyante ?
S04n449:1323: tatra nityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena ?
S04n449:1333: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavān srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇam |
S04n449:1334: yena srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇakuśalā uttarottarasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvopāyalakṣaṇavidhijñāstathā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04n449:1335: yathā nairātmyalakṣaṇadvayamāvaraṇadvayaṃ ca prativiśodhya bhūmerbhūmilakṣaṇātikramagatiṃgatāstathāgatācintyagativiṣayagocaraṃ pratilabhya viśvarūpamaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvasattvopajīvyatāmadhigaccheyuḥ,
S04n449:1340: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n449:1343: yaduta hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭāḥ tatra mahāmate hīnaḥ saptajanmabhavaparamaḥ |
S04n449:1346: eṣāṃ tu mahāmate trayāṇāṃ trīṇi saṃyojanāni mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇyeva bhavanti |
S04n449:1349: etāni mahāmate trīṇi saṃyojanāni viśeṣottarottareṇa arhatāmarhatphalībhavanti |
S04n449:1350: tatra mahāmate satkāyadṛṣṭirdvividhā yaduta sahajā ca parikalpitā ca,
S04n449:1353: sa ca tatra na sannāsanna sadasan,
S04n449:1355: atha ca bālairvikalpyate vicitrasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśena mṛgatṛṣṇikeva mṛgaiḥ |
S04n449:1358: sahajā punarmahāmate srotaāpannasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ svaparakāyasamatayā catuḥskandharūpalakṣaṇatvādrūpasyotpattibhūtabhautikatvātparasparahetulakṣaṇatvādbhūtānāṃ rūpasyāsamudaya iti kṛtvā srotaāpannasya sadasatpakṣadṛṣṭidarśanātsatkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīṇā bhavati |
S04n449:1359: ata eva satkāyadṛṣṭiprahīṇasya rāgo na pravartate |
S04n449:1361: vicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate yaduta prāptidharmādhigamasudṛṣṭilakṣaṇatvātpūrvaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭidvayavikalpaprahīṇatvācca vicikitsā dharmeṣu na bhavati |
S04n449:1364: śīlaṃ punarmahāmate kathaṃ na parāmṛśati srotaāpannaḥ ?
S04n449:1366: parāmṛṣṭiḥ punarmahāmate yaduta śīlavratataponiyamairbālapṛthagjanā bhogasukhābhilāṣiṇo bhavotpattiṃ prārthayante,
S04n449:1371: na tu mahāmate srotaāpannasya trisaṃyojanaprahīṇasya rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante ||
S04n449:1394: anye punarmahāmate bodhisattvacaryācaritāvino buddhanirmitanairmāṇikāśca upāyakuśalamūlapraṇidhānapūrvakatvātparṣanmaṇḍaleṣūpapattiṃ darśayanti buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalopaśobhanārtham |
S04n449:1400: saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattiśca mahāmate svacittadṛśyagativyatikramastasya na yujyate cittamātratvāt ||
S04n449:1406: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam |
S04n449:1408: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dviprakārā buddhiḥ pravicayabuddhiśca vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā ca |
S04n449:1409: tatra mahāmate pravicayabuddhirnāma yaduta yayā buddhyā bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pravicīyamānaṃ catuṣkoṭikārahitaṃ nopalabhyate,
S04n449:1411: tatra mahāmate catuṣkoṭikā yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayanobhayāstināstinityānityarahitāṃ catuṣkoṭikāmiti vadāmi |
S04n449:1412: etayā catuṣkoṭikayā mahāmate rahitāḥ sarvadharmā ityucyate |
S04n449:1415: yaduta yena mahāmate cittavikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśena uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinānabhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇān mahābhūtān pratijñāhetulakṣaṇadṛṣṭāntābhiniveśādasadbhūtasamāropeṇa samāropayati,
S04n449:1417: etanmahāmate buddhidvayasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena buddhidvayalakṣaṇena samanvāgatā bodhisattvā dharmapudgalanairātmyalakṣaṇagatiṃgatā nirābhāsabuddhipravicayacaryābhūmikuśalāḥ prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhante,
S04n449:1422: kṣetraśataṃ cāvabhāsya uttarottarabhūmilakṣaṇavidhijñāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanto dharmameghābhiṣekābhiṣiktāstathāgatapratyātmabhūmimadhigamya daśaniṣṭhāpadasunibaddhadharmāṇaḥ sattvaparipākāya vicitrairnirmāṇakiraṇairvirājante pratyātmagatisukhasamāhitāḥ ||
S04n449:1423: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhūtabhautikakuśalena bhavitavyam |
S04n449:1424: kathaṃ ca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahābhūtabhautikakuśalo bhavati ?
S04n449:1425: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate tatsatyaṃ yatra mahābhūtānāmasaṃbhavo'saṃbhūtāni cemāni mahāmate bhūtānīti prativipaśyati |
S04n449:1426: evaṃ prativipaśyan nāma vikalpamātraṃ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānnāma cittadṛśyavikalpamātramidaṃ yaduta traidhātukaṃ mahābhūtabhautikarahitaṃ prativipaśyati cātuṣkoṭikanayaviśuddhimātmātmīyarahitaṃ yathābhūtasvalakṣaṇāvasthānāvasthitamanutpādasvalakṣaṇasiddham |
S04n449:1427: tatra mahāmate mahābhūteṣu kathaṃ bhautiakaṃ bhavati ?
S04n449:1438: tasmādetanmahāmate mahābhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaṃ tīrthakarairvikalpyate na tu mayā ||
S04n449:1442: tatra mahāmate catvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānaṃ ca |
S04n449:1445: na ca mahāmate arūpiṇāṃ catuṣkasaṃkhyā bhavatyākāśavat |
S04n449:1448: evameva mahāmate skandhāḥ saṃkhyālakṣaṇagaṇanātītā bhāvābhāvavivarjitāścātuṣkoṭikarahitāḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanānirdeśena nirdiśyante bālairna tvāryaiḥ ||
S04n449:1454: sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tīrthyadṛṣṭinivāraṇāya viviktadharmopadeśena mahāmate kriyamāṇena dharmanairātmyadarśanaṃ viśudhyate,
S04n449:1460: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvopajīvyo bhavati ||
S04n449:1464: etanmahāmate caturvidhaṃ tīrthakarāṇāṃ nirvāṇaṃ na tu matpravacane |
S04n449:1469: tatkathaṃ manovijñānasyaiva vyāvṛttirbhavati na tu saptānāṃ vijñānānām ?
S04n449:1471: manovijñānaṃ punarmahāmate viṣayaparicchedābhiniveśena pravartamānaṃ vāsanābhirālayavijñānaṃ prapuṣṇāti |
S04n449:1474: udadhitaraṃgā iva mahāmate svacittadṛśyaviṣayapavaneritāḥ pravartante nivartante ca |
S04n449:1475: atastena mahāmate manovijñānena vyāvṛttena saptānāṃ vijñānānāṃ vyāvṛttirbhavati ||
S04n449:1477: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca |
S04n449:1480: hetuṃ dadāti cittasya vijñānaṃ ca samāśritam || 178 ||
S04n449:1484: punaraparaṃ mahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇamupadekṣyāmo yena parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena tvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vikalpakalparahitāḥ pratyātmāryasvagatitīrthyanayagatisudṛṣṭabuddhayo grāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇāḥ paratantravividhavicitralakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvākāraṃ na prativikalpayiṣyanti |
S04n449:1486: yaduta abhilāpavikalpo'vidheyavikalpo lakṣaṇavikalpo'rthavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpo hetuvikalpo dṛṣṭivikalpo yuktivikalpa utpādavikalpo'nutpādavikalpaḥ saṃbandhavikalpo bandhābandhavikalpaḥ |
S04n449:1492: yaduta asti tatkiṃcidabhidheyavastu svabhāvakamāryajñānagatigamyaṃ yadāśrityābhilāpaḥ pravartate iti vikalpayati |
S04n449:1494: yaduta tasminnevābhidheye mṛgatṛṣṇākhye lakṣaṇavaicitryābhiniveśenābhiniveśate yaduta uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinalakṣaṇātsarvabhāvān vikalpayati |
S04n449:1500: yaduta yadyena hetupratyayena sadasatorvibhajyate hetulakṣaṇotpattitaḥ sa hetuvikalpaḥ |
S04n449:1513: yathā puruṣaḥ pāśasaṃyogādrajjugranthiḥ kriyate mucyate ca |
S04n449:1525: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairmāyā nāstyastitvena nābhiniveṣṭavyā ||
S04n449:1528: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca prajñā vai saṃpravartate || 180 ||
S04n449:1530: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate || 181 ||
S04n449:1532: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati || 182 ||
S04n449:1539: yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate |
S04n449:1540: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam || 186 ||
S04n449:1542: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathābudhaiḥ || 187 ||
S04n449:1543: haimaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam |
S04n449:1545: nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraśca vidyate |
S04n449:1555: pañca dharmā bhavettattvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā |
S04n449:1559: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ tu na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam |
S04n449:1560: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā vikalpyate || 196 ||
S04n449:1562: bhāvābhāvavinirmukto dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ nu tau || 197 ||
S04n449:1569: punarapi mahāmatirāha-deśayatu me bhagavān pratyātmāryajñānagatilakṣaṇamekayānaṃ ca,
S04n449:1570: yena bhagavan pratyātmaikayānagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyātmāryajñānaikayānakuśalā aparapraṇeyā bhaviṣyanti buddhadharmeṣu ||
S04n449:1574: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n449:1575: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-pramāṇāptopadeśavikalpābhāvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekākī rahogataḥ svapratyātmabuddhyā vicārayatyaparapraṇeyo dṛṣṭivikalpavivarjita uttarottaratathāgatabhūmipraveśanatayā vyāyamate |
S04n449:1589: yadā teṣāṃ mahāmate sarvadoṣavāsanāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti dharmanairātmyāvabodhāt,
S04n449:1591: punarapi lokottarānāsravadhātuparyāpannān saṃbhārān paripūrya acintyadharmakāyavaśavartitāṃ pratilapsyante ||
S04n449:1595: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate |
S04n449:1596: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ || 202 ||
S04n449:1602: tathā hi śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate || 205 ||
S04n449:1605: niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti na ca bhūyo nivartate |
S04n449:1608: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam || 208 ||
S04n449:1609: iti laṅkāvatāre ṣaṭtriṃśatsāhasrasarvadharmasamuccayo nāma dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ ||
